inputs.remark:
缺少V4，一个月后的follow up数据
V1 缺少hearing aid verification 数据
V3 HINT的数据缺少HINT Binaural 85% @ 60dB

logic_summary: Added 'Hearing Aid Verification' to V1 tests as per text ('hearing aid verification of JH's current hearing aids... was completed').
Added missing 'HINT_Quiet_Binaural_60dBHL': '85%' to V3 HINT results as per Table 61.1.
Added V4 (Post-operative Follow-up) to capture the missing outcome data ('Missing V4, one month later follow up data' interpreted as the post-op outcome sequence).

value.name: Hearing Aid Verification
value.key_findings: Current ITE hearing aids verified to be underamplifying to adult DSL targets.

history.present_illness: Follow-up after cochlear implantation and activation.

tests.name: Aided Soundfield Thresholds
tests.key_findings: Improved thresholds compared to pre-op aids; stable over time.

tests.name: Speech Perception
tests.key_findings: Significant benefit; HINT scores improved significantly compared to pre-op.
